mapper.select: select BT.vehicle_no from BUS_TB as BT join UWB_MODULE_TB as UMT on BT.id = UMT.owner_id where uuid = #{uuid};

select DEST_SEQ-START_SEQ from (select bus_station_id AS START_SEQ from BUS_ROUTE_TB where route_num = #{route_num} and bus_station_id = #{start_id}) as A join (select bus_station_id AS DEST_SEQ from BUS_ROUTE_TB where route_num = #{route_num} and bus_station_id = #{dest_id}) as B
